intro: Tithymalus glaberrimus, commonly known as the smooth tithymalus, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, erect stems and small, clustered flowers that typically bloom in shades of white or pale yellow. The plant has finely divided, feathery leaves that give it a delicate appearance. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in woodland or streamside habitats. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
